content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Customize columns in Attack Surface Discovery asset lists March 25, 2024—You can now customize the columns displayed in asset lists for all asset types in Attack Surface Discovery. Show or hide specific columns, and rearrange column order by dragging and dropping. Cyber Risk Exposure Management → Attack Surface Discovery © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
